name: Solar System (itch) (Salazans)
description:
Solar system project from the MSU Unity course in Coursera.

Click any object to follow it.

Right-click to reset the view.

  • Featuring the first four planets of our system.
  • Changed material smoothness so the planets look more realistic and sunlight looks better.
  • Eclipses! Enabled shadows.
  • Removed the directional light for additional realism.
  • Planets have accurately proportional revolution times.
  • Comets fly in a different plane so they don't crash into anything.
  • Turned planets into prefabs (not sure if it was worth it tho).

Created by Salazans!
